    1. Lane()

类 Lane

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow.Lane
public class Lane extends Object
Represents a lane in the game that holds notes, manages their visibility and judgement status, and processes updates for autoplay and user input. The lane stores notes in two separate lists: one for rendering and one for judgement. It also manages scoring, combo tracking, and hit statistics.
